response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it's destined to be a cornerstone in your collection. Given its significance, I am extending an offer to purchase it for $1,150,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also allowing me to maximize the return on this valuable asset. I look forward to discussing the details further and welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this remarkable piece.", "product_price": 1150000}
